title: the rise
author: the rise
created_time: June 07, 2022, 03:30:34 PMLast edit: June 27, 2022, 03:29:01 PM by the rise
content: GENERAL RULES✔️ We are allocating 812,500 Tokens✔️ Bounty will run 12 week✔️ USE WALLET BSC TO RECEIVE YOUR REWARD✔️ The token distribution process to participants (our supporters) will be arranged and carried out by the Discas DAO team.✔️ Does not send bounty issues and is strictly forbidden to send spam messages in telegram✔️ Participants who do not follow the rules of each campaign will not get stakes/reward✔️ If you have other questions, please join Discas DAC Telegram Bounty✔️ All participants must join Discas DAO Telegram Group✔️ Using multiple accounts, cheating, and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty program immediately, and all your accounts will be banned permanently.✔️ We reserve the right to make changes on any terms if it’s reasonable to do so✔️ We reserve the right to remove a participant from the campaign for a valid reason.✔️ We reserve the right to suspend or have the allocation reduced on a certain bounty if we found it underperforming.✔️ We reserve the right to make adjustments and modifications to the rules if necessary✔️ By agreeing to this rule, you are subject to the existing rulesweek 1 : 07/06 - 13/06week 2 : 14/06 - 20/06week 3 : 21/06 - 27/06week 4 : 28/06 - 03/07 week 5 : 04/07 - 10/07 week 6 : 11/07 - 17/07 week 7 : 18/07 - 24/07 week 8 : 25/07 - 01/08 week 10 : 02/08 - 08/06 week 11 : 02/08 - 08/06 Proof of Authentication Post FormatCode:Proof of Authentication PostBitcointalk Username: Bitcointalk Profile Link: telegram Username:Campaign Participated: BSC Wallet Address:Important:1. Read the Rules from the bounty thread carefully.2. Please read the Disclaimer carefully. Rewards:- Have more than 500 followers: 1 stake/week- Have more than 2500 followers: 2 stakes/week- Have more than 5001 followers: 5 stakes/week- Have more than 10,001 followers: 10 stakes/week Rules:  - Every participant must follow the DisCas Dao Twitter Page- Twitter account must be original (90% in Twitter audit)- Twitter account must have a minimum of 500 followers- You must make minimum of 5 retweets & 3 tweets per week. Mention DisCas Dao Project, use a minimum of 3 hashtags, a maximum of 10, use a different hashtag every tweet or retweets  #bitcoin #bitcoinindonesia #ido #bitcoinnews #investment #investasi #investor #investingtips #diskusi #discus #medsos #mediapartner #socialmedia #ico #teknologi #technology #techno #application #aplikasi #nft #nftart #nfts #nftartis #nft #nftcommunity #nftwork #nftcollectible #nftcollection #nftdrop #nftartist #nftinvestor #blockchain #blockchaintechnology #blockchainnews #blockchainwallet- Every retweet must be likedReport Format:You must post all your retweet links and tweets in the following format every week, otherwise your bet will not be rewarded:[/list]Code:Bitcointalk username:Number spreadsheet :Twitter Profile Link:Week 1Retweet Link 1Retweet Link 2Retweet Link 3Retweet Link 4Retweet Link 5Week 1Tweet Link 1Tweet Link 2Tweet Link 3...Rewards:- Have more than 500 friends : 1 stake/week- Have more than 2500 friends: 2 stakes/week- Have more than 5001 friends: 5 stakes/week- Have more than 10,001 friends: 10 stakes/week Rules:  - Every participant must like the Facebook DisCas Dao- You must make minimum of 5 repost & 3 post each week . Mention DisCas Dao Project, use a minimum of 3 hashtags, a maximum of 10, use a different hashtag every post or repost  #bitcoin #bitcoinindonesia #ido #bitcoinnews #investment #investasi #investor #investingtips #diskusi #discus #medsos #mediapartner #socialmedia #ico #teknologi #technology #techno #application #aplikasi #nft #nftart #nfts #nftartis #nft #nftcommunity #nftwork #nftcollectible #nftcollection #nftdrop #nftartist #nftinvestor #blockchain #blockchaintechnology #blockchainnews #blockchainwallet- Every repost must be likedReport Format:You must post all your retweet links and tweets in the following format every week, otherwise your bet will not be rewarded:Code:Bitcointalk username:Number spreadsheet :facebook Profile Link:Week 1Share Link 1Share Link 2Share Link 3Share Link 4Share Link 5Week 1Post Link 1Post Link 2Post Link 3...reward:- 1 stake/weekRules:- Follow Tiktok DisCas Dao- Like all the posts it has- Comment on all the posts- Also you need to like all the future posts they gonna postReport Format:You must post all your retweet links and tweets in the following format every week, otherwise your bet will not be rewarded:Code:Bitcointalk username:Number spreadsheet :Tiktok Profile Link:Week 1Video Link 1Video Link 2Video Link 3Video Link 4Video Link 5...Rewards based on quality:- Good : 5 stake- Medium : 3 stake- Bad : 1 stakeTo qualify for a blog bounty, each article must:- Has 500+ words or more without spaces- Contain at least 2 links to the DisCas Dao Project.- Have unique content (ANN translations do not count)- The reward will be negotiated based on article length + value of the publication, Content Quality And we reserved the right to give any Blog/ Article any coins.- Strictly NO to Plagiarism, content must pass the Copyscape.- Must include at least 3 official DisCas DAO Project links (Website, Twitter, Youtube, Medium,  Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn)- No hate speech, racism, the religious or personal attack. The content must be respected and mannerful in all ways.- contents must remain active for at least 60 days.- Articles published on these platforms Like .blogspot LinkedIn or other free blogging websites do not count.- We Reserve the right to reject any blog/ entry.- every bounty hunter participant can write up to 8 articles.Rewards:- High quality: 3 stakes (High quality video and >3000 views)- Good quality: 2 stakes (Good quality video and >2000 views )- Average quality: 1 stake (Average quality video and >700 views)For this task, bounty hunters will be rewarded for creating high-quality unique, interesting, and engaging videos about DisCas Dao Project.Some examples of potential topics:Please go to the second post to read about potential topics.Rules:- subscribe youtobe DisCas Dao- you must have at least 1000 subscribers- The video description Be sure to include the following hashtags, or select some using a maximum of 6 tags  #bitcoin #bitcoinindonesia #ido #bitcoinnews #investment #investasi #investor #investingtips #diskusi #discus #medsos #mediapartner #socialmedia #ico #teknologi #technology #techno #application #aplikasi #nft #nftart #nfts #nftartis #nft #nftcommunity #nftwork #nftcollectible #nftcollection #nftdrop #nftartist #nftinvestor #blockchain #blockchaintechnology #blockchainnews #blockchainwallet- Any language is accepted.- Sound and video quality must be high, although webcam and smartphone videos are accepted.- Content must be unique and original.- The more views you accumulate, the more tokens you will be allotted.- All views will be counted after the end of the campaign and will reward its creator accordingly.- The video must be more than 1 min in length.- No hate speech, racism, the religious or personal attack. The content must be respected and mannerful in all ways.- every bounty hunter participant can write up to 8 Vidio.Rewards:- Have more than 500 followers: 1 stake/week- Have more than 2500 followers: 2 stakes/week- Have more than 5001 followers: 5 stakes/week- Have more than 10,001 followers: 10 stakes/week Rules:  - Every participant must follow the Instagram DisCas Dao- Each participant must follow Instagram DisCas Dao- Must like and share all posts from the DisCas DAO - You must make at least 5 posts/week. Be sure to include the following hashtags, or select some using a maximum of 6 tags  #bitcoin #bitcoinindonesia #ido #bitcoinnews #investment #investasi #investor #investingtips #diskusi #discus #medsos #mediapartner #socialmedia #ico #teknologi #technology #techno #application #aplikasi #nft #nftart #nfts #nftartis #nft #nftcommunity #nftwork #nftcollectible #nftcollection #nftdrop #nftartist #nftinvestor #blockchain #blockchaintechnology #blockchainnews #blockchainwallet- For pictures can be taken on the websiteCode:Bitcointalk username:Number spreadsheet :Instagram Profile Link:Week 1Post Link 1Post Link 2Post Link 3Post Link 4Post Link 5...use name : Discas DAC ( your username | Discas DAC )Rewards:- 1 stake/participantsRules:- use our avatar & add username on your telegram profile- must join telegramTelegram campaigns don't need weekly reportsPayment:- 1 stake each relevant reviewRules:- every participant must download the DISCAS APP- use this referral code when registering in the DisCas DAO app, it will make it easier to track you :OGJJOM5G- you have to make a relevant review & and give 5 stars- the review must contain at least 150 characters- short reviews such as ''good app, very good project, good luck, or anything else'' will be rejected- each participant can only submit 1 review Payment:1 stake/weekRules:- Each participant must follow the work rules given by the team- Participants must follow DisCas DAO telegram and twitter accounts- Participants will be selected directly by the team- Accepted participants will be put into a special group- don't work until you are accepted- Shilling on Bitcointalk forums is NOT ALLOWEDCode:Bitcointalk username:Number spreadsheet :Week 1Post Link 1Post Link 2Post Link 3Post Link 4Post Link 5...QuoteDisclaimer: "The managers of this campaign and author of this post are not part of the entity. Bounty managers are providing their services for tracking and evaluating participants in the campaign for the purpose of reporting results to the projects core team. Therefore, you are joining the bounty at your own risk. Please do your own due diligence as  past performance does not guarantee future results." [/list]
